metadata.title: RHSA-2023:0202: java-11-openjdk security and bug fix update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The java-11-openjdk packages provide the OpenJDK 11 Java Runtime Environment and the OpenJDK 11 Java Software Development Kit.

Security Fix(es):

* OpenJDK: handshake DoS attack against DTLS connections (JSSE, 8287411) (CVE-2023-21835)

* OpenJDK: soundbank URL remote loading (Sound, 8293742) (CVE-2023-21843)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Bug Fix(es):

* Prepare for the next quarterly OpenJDK upstream release (2023-01, 11.0.18) [rhel-9] (BZ#2157798)

bugzilla.text: handshake DoS attack against DTLS connections (JSSE, 8287411)
